channel.title: Return of the Darkness Upick - Full, Accepting Backups
channel.description:
![image|617x500](upload://cqFZ2WTt4gDTWB82dhgKIKnvo1d.jpeg) Hosted and (will be) designed by @Icibalus Reviewed by @eevee and @DatBird
## [u]`Rules`[/u] - Follow the [Global Forum/Discord/Game/Meta Rules - Please Read First ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244), and the [Official Forum Mafia and Forum of Lies Rules ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926). Please make sure you have enough time for this game before you sign up. - Alts will ***not*** be allowed in this game, and they are disallowed as a game mechanic. - Having fun is impossible. Do not attempt it. This rule will not be enforced, it is merely for your own safety. ## [u]`Gameplay`[/u] - Day phases will last 48 hours, or until curtailed by an execution. - The execution will be decided by means of Majority + Plurality. If a simple majority of all living players are voting for somebody, the day will end early and they will be executed. Otherwise, the player with the most votes will be executed at hte end of the day. - If at the end of the day the votes are tied, a random player among the tied votes will be executed. - Voting to execute nobody is a valid vote. If this vote reaches majority or has the plurality of votes, nobody will be executed. - Night phases will last 24 hours, however they may be shortened or extended slightly to keep EoD constant. - Days will begin and end at 18:00 PM BST unless otherwise stated. - The [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] will communicate via a discord server, which will be publicised at the end of the game unless a member of the [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] objects. - The [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] have an assigned factional kill, use of which is not compulsive. ## [u]`Setup`[/u] - **The setup, at this time, has not yet been designed**. - When you sign up, please *privately* send the host the name of a fictional character (i will give you leeway on this requirement if it's entertaining), and two other backup choices, in case you pick the same as somebody else. Please do not discuss these choices anywhere until the game begins. - Using those names, I will create the setup according to these parameters: - - 1 - Allignments will be randed independently of name choices. - - 2 - I will then construct a setup where all players have the randed allignment **and** abilities and rolename based on one of their character choices. I will attempt to use your first choice, but may use backup choices if the setup requires abilities incompatabile with your first choice's abilities. - - 3 - All players in the game will be either [color=green]**Town**[/color] or [color=red]**Mafia**[/color]. - - 4 - The game will not be bastard, however it may contain some elements on the boundary. If you're expecting a vanilla-like game, I honestly do not know why you're even considering joining a Upick. ## [u]`Example Rolecard`[/u] [details=""] # [color=green]**`Joycat`**[/color] ![image|225x225](upload://cGhm2OmJuBbcgXTXWcXFq7bEcPE.png) *:joy_crab: :joy_crab: :joy_crab: :joy_crab:* You are [color=green]**Joycat**[/color], a meme that is currently using Marshal as a phylactery to bypass its' proper death- as such, you are a [color=green]**Town Example**[/color] - **Impossible to Avoid (Passive) »** - Your rolecard will be publicly revealed at the beginning of the game. - **Indicative of Site Quality (Passive) »** - You are immune to death due to not being in the game. - **:joy_cat: (Night) »** - :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: - Infinite uses. You win with the [color=green]**Town**[/color]. Eliminate all [color=red]**Mafia**[/color]. [/details] ## [u]`Signups`[/u] 1. Marluxion 2. Nightingale 3. an_gorta_pratai 4. Mistyx 5. Jane 6. ZoneQ11 7. WindwardAway 8. EliThePsycho 9. Chloe 10. SirDerpsALot 11. Marshal 12. Katze 13. min 14. ArcticXI 15. Apprentice 16. TrustworthyLiberal 17. Silviu200530 ## [u]`Backups`[/u] - ATNoName - YouButWorse - Whysper - GGhana - Intensify - Ami ## [u]`Spectators`[/u] - Astand - Alice - Amelia - EVO - Conduit - Cheeki - Wazza - Appelsiini (Uninformed)

item.title: Return of the Darkness Upick - Full, Accepting Backups
item.dc:creator: DatBird
item.description:
All cards are sent out, so N0 begins. Idk the exact time frame for how long it is. You will find out that and more… on the Next episode of Survivor… whenever Luna wakes up. Have fun!

Read full topic
item.source: Return of the Darkness Upick - Full, Accepting Backups

item.title: Return of the Darkness Upick - Full, Accepting Backups
item.dc:creator: DatBird
item.description:
Hey Yall Sorry for the bad news...

Game has passed review! And @Icibalus is asleep… And im now cohost. So give me some time and cards will be sent out and then I will start N0 here after they are all sent out and Ici will end N0 when she decides, and the game will continue/start day 1 in another thread made by Ici, when they get up.

@Marluxion
@Nightingale
@an_gorta_pratai
@Mistyx
@Jane
@Zone_Q11
@WindwardAway
@EliThePsycho
@Chloe
@SirDerpsALot
@Marshal
@Katze
@min
@Arctic
@Apprentice
@TrustworthyLiberal
@Silviu200530

Read full topic

item.title: Return of the Darkness Upick - Full, Accepting Backups
item.dc:creator: eevee
item.description:
DatBird:

We are in the final stages of the review. It will be the next game to start and most likely start tomorrow.

Day after tommorow*

It’s holiday time.
Well, maybe not for everyone, but you know the gist.

Personaly, Im at my family mansion, meeting relatives. (And I would rather spend family time over reviewing games through phone)

And even tho not everyone can do this (pandemy), it will also be better to start day 1 at time where there is no global holidays who may stop some people from putting early effort.

Eother way, game will not start tommorow.
Spend time with family amd friends.
Eevee is a nerd.

Read full topic
